attributes.action: Prosecute animal owners who abuse and kill precious animals
attributes.additional_details: Because there needs to be justice for innocent animals who are neglected by monsters the system needs to change and there needs to be serious consequences and punishment to those who engage in this sort of cruel behaviours. I urge that changes need to happen drastically for the safety and protection of those animals.#animal justice
attributes.background: Jail people who abuse and neglect animals unfortunately dogs and other animals are neglected by those who are supposed to love and protect them and keep them safe. The law on animal abuse needs to change it seems that these horrible individuals do not receive the punishment they deserve

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Impose prison sentences, lifetime bans and random checks on animal abusers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654828

If you want the Government to change laws on animal welfare in a different way to the above petition, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
